cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Rammeavtale - Møbel og inventar (eksl. kontormøbler)
Framework agreement - Furniture and fixtures (excluding office furniture)
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description:
Narvik kommune (NK) - med flere - inviterer til åpen anbudskonkurranser for kjøp av:
- Møbler og inventar (kontormøbler er ikke en del av denne avtalen)
(Se konkurransedokumenter for nærmere informasjon)

Narvik municipality (NK) - etc. - invites tenderers to an open tender contest for the purchase of:
- Furniture and fixtures (office furniture is not a part of this agreement)
(See the tender documentation for further information)

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Firmaattest
Registration
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description:
Leverandør skal være et lovlig etablert foretak og være registrert i et foretaksregister eller et handelsregister i medlemsstaten som leverandøren er etablert i. Firmaattesten skal ikke være eldre enn 6 måneder.
Utenlandske leverandører: Bekreftelse på at selskapet er registrert i et foretaksregister, fagligregister eller et handelsregister i den staten leverandøren er etablert.

Tenderers shall be a legally established company and registered in a company register or a commerce register in the member state where the tenderer is established. The Company Registration Certificate must not be more than six months old.
Foreign tenderers: Confirmation that the tenderer is registered in a company register, professional register or a commerce register in the country where the tenderer is established.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Skatt- og merverdiavgiftsattest
Tax and VAT certificate
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description:
Leverandør må ha oppfylt sine forpliktelser med hensyn til betaling av skatt, merverdiavgift og arbeidsgiveravgift ihht. lovbestemmelsene.
Skatt- og merverdiavgiftsattest skal ikke være eldre enn 6 måneder regnet fra tilbudsfristens utløp. Eventuelle restanser eller andre misligheter må begrunnes. Dersom leverandør planlegger å benytte underleverandører må skatteattest også leveres for disse.
Utenlandske leverandører må levere tilsvarende bekreftelse fra nasjonale myndigheter.

Tenderers must have fulfilled their obligations with respect to the payment of tax, VAT and payroll tax in accordance with. the legal provisions.
Tax and VAT certificate must not be older than six months calculated from the tender deadline. Any arrears or other irregularities must be justified. If the tenderer is planning to use sub-suppliers, tax certificates must be provided for them as well.
Foreign tenderers must submit equivalent confirmation from national authorities.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Økonomisk og finansiell kapasitet
Economic and financial capacity
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description:
Krav: Leverandøren skal ha økonomisk kapasitet til å gjennomføre leveranse/kontrakten.
Norske Leverandører: Minimum konkursrating A i Proff Forvalt.
Oppdragsgiveren vil selv sjekke finansiell kapasitet i Proff Forvalt. Dersom det ikke er tilstrekkelig informasjon tilgjengelig i Proff Forvalt skal leverandøren på forespørsel ettersende nødvendig informasjon uten ugrunnet opphold.
Utenlandske leverandører: Det skal legges ved utskrift av kredittvurdering som viser økonomisk rangering. Utskrift hentes fra et anerkjent kredittvurderingsselskap. Kredittratingen bør ikke være eldre enn 3 måneder gammel. Definisjon på symbolene kredittvurderingsinstitusjonen benytter må ligge vedlagt slik at oppdragsgiver kan vurdere forskjellige ratinger opp mot hverandre. Dersom leverandøren har saklig grunn til ikke å fremlegge den dokumentasjon oppdragsgiver har krevd, kan han dokumentere sin økonomiske og finansielle kapasitet ved å fremlegge ethvert annet dokument som oppdragsgiver anser egnet.
For alle leverandører: Oppdragsgiver kan vurdere og akseptere enhver annen skriftlig dokumentasjon vedrørende leverandørens økonomiske kapasitet, og akseptere at leverandør støtter seg på forpliktelse fra annet juridisk subjekt.

Requirement: The tenderer must have the financial capacity to carry out the delivery/contract.
Norwegian tenderers: Minimum bankruptcy rating A in Proff Forvalt.
The contracting authority will check the financial capacity in Proff Forvalt itself. If sufficient information is not available in Proff Forvalt, the tenderer shall upon request, send the necessary information without undue delay.
Foreign tenderers: A printout of a credit rating showing the financial ranking shall be enclosed. A printout is to be obtained from a certified credit rating company. The credit rating should not be older than 3 months. A definition of the symbols that the credit rating institution uses must be enclosed so that the contracting authority can assess different ratings up against each other. If a tenderer has a justifiable reason for not submitting the documentation required by the contracting authority, he can document his economic and financial capacity by presenting any other document that the Contracting Authority deems appropriate.
For all tenderers: The contracting authority can assess and accept any other written documentation regarding the tenderer's financial capacity and accept that the tenderer relies on obligations from another legal subject.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: It meets the objective and non discriminatory criteria or rules to be applied in order to limit the number of candidates in the following way: In case certain certificates or other forms of documentary evidence are required, please indicate for each whether the economic operator has the required documents:

It meets the objective and non discriminatory criteria or rules to be applied in order to limit the number of candidates in the following way: In case certain certificates or other forms of documentary evidence are required, please indicate for each whether the economic operator has the required documents:
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: If some of these certificates or forms of documentary evidence are available electronically, please indicate for each:
If some of these certificates or forms of documentary evidence are available electronically, please indicate for each:

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: All selection criteria will be satisfied
All selection criteria will be satisfied
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: It satisfies all the required selection criteria indicated in the relevant notice or in the procurement documents referred to in the notice.
It satisfies all the required selection criteria indicated in the relevant notice or in the procurement documents referred to in the notice.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Enrolment in a relevant professional register
Enrolment in a relevant professional register
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: It is enrolled in relevant professional registers kept in the Member State of its establishment as described in Annex XI of Directive 2014/24/EU; economic operators from certain Member States may have to comply with other requirements set out in that Annex.

It is enrolled in relevant professional registers kept in the Member State of its establishment as described in Annex XI of Directive 2014/24/EU; economic operators from certain Member States may have to comply with other requirements set out in that Annex.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Enrolment in a trade register
Enrolment in a trade register
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: It is enrolled in trade registers kept in the Member State of its establishment as described in Annex XI of Directive 2014/24/EU; economic operators from certain Member States may have to comply with other requirements set out in that Annex.

It is enrolled in trade registers kept in the Member State of its establishment as described in Annex XI of Directive 2014/24/EU; economic operators from certain Member States may have to comply with other requirements set out in that Annex.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: For service contracts: authorisation of particular organisation needed
For service contracts: authorisation of particular organisation needed
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Is a particular authorisation of a particular organisation needed in order to be able to perform the service in question in the country of establishment of the economic operator?
Is a particular authorisation of a particular organisation needed in order to be able to perform the service in question in the country of establishment of the economic operator?

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: For service contracts: membership of particular organisation needed
For service contracts: membership of particular organisation needed
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Is a particular membership of a particular organisation needed in order to be able to perform the service in question in the country of establishment of the economic operator?
Is a particular membership of a particular organisation needed in order to be able to perform the service in question in the country of establishment of the economic operator?

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Allowance of checks
Allowance of checks
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: For complex products or services to be supplied or, exceptionally, for products or services which are required for a special purpose: The economic operator will allow checks to be conducted on the production capacities or the technical capacity of the economic operator and, where necessary, on the means of study and research which are available to it and on the quality control measures? The check is to be performed by the contracting authority or, in case the latter consents to this, on its behalf by a competent official body of the country in which the supplier or service provider is established.

For complex products or services to be supplied or, exceptionally, for products or services which are required for a special purpose: The economic operator will allow checks to be conducted on the production capacities or the technical capacity of the economic operator and, where necessary, on the means of study and research which are available to it and on the quality control measures? The check is to be performed by the contracting authority or, in case the latter consents to this, on its behalf by a competent official body of the country in which the supplier or service provider is established.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: samples, descriptions or photographs without certification of authenticity
For supply contracts: samples, descriptions or photographs without certification of authenticity
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: For public supply contracts: The economic operator will supply the required samples, descriptions or photographs of the products to be supplied, which do not need to be accompanied by certifications of authenticity.

For public supply contracts: The economic operator will supply the required samples, descriptions or photographs of the products to be supplied, which do not need to be accompanied by certifications of authenticity.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: samples, descriptions or photographs with certification of authenticity
For supply contracts: samples, descriptions or photographs with certification of authenticity
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: For public supply contracts: The economic operator will supply the required samples, descriptions or photographs of the products to be supplied and will provide certifications of authenticity where applicable.

For public supply contracts: The economic operator will supply the required samples, descriptions or photographs of the products to be supplied and will provide certifications of authenticity where applicable.

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: For supply contracts: certificates by quality control institutes
For supply contracts: certificates by quality control institutes
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Can the economic operator provide the required certificates drawn up by official quality control institutes or agencies of recognised competence attesting the conformity of products clearly identified by references to the technical specifications or standards, which are set out in the relevant notice or the procurement documents?

Can the economic operator provide the required certificates drawn up by official quality control institutes or agencies of recognised competence attesting the conformity of products clearly identified by references to the technical specifications or standards, which are set out in the relevant notice or the procurement documents?

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Certificates by independent bodies about arderquality assurance standards
Certificates by independent bodies about arderquality assurance standards
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Will the economic operator be able to produce certificates drawn up by independent bodies attesting that the economic operator complies with the required quality assurance standards, including accessibility for disabled persons?

Will the economic operator be able to produce certificates drawn up by independent bodies attesting that the economic operator complies with the required quality assurance standards, including accessibility for disabled persons?

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Certificates by independent bodies about environmental management systems or standards
Certificates by independent bodies about environmental management systems or standards
efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Description: Will the economic operator be able to produce certificates drawn up by independent bodies attesting that the economic operator complies with the required environmental management systems or standards?
Will the economic operator be able to produce certificates drawn up by independent bodies that the economic operator complies with the required environmental management systems or standards?

Tender documentation
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description:

- Møbler og inventar (kontormøbler er ikke en del av denne avtalen)
(Se konkurransedokumenter for nærmere informasjon)

Narvik municipality (NK) - etc. - invites tenderers to an open tender contest for the purchase of:
- Furniture and fixtures (office furniture is not a part of this agreement)
